content: otis the owl is a tiny little owl that fits in the palm of your hand he is quick and easy to make and just so adorable from the top of his head to his tiny little feet **printable ad-free pdf versions of the full pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/802821341/otis-the-owl-crochet-pattern-pdf-instant
